typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		patient_id as string,
		first_name1 as string,
		last_name2 as string,
		mrn as string,
		fin as string,
		{Last Care Setting} as string,
		wound_started as string,
		{Wound Number} as string,
		{Last Visit Date} as string,
		first_name9 as string,
		last_name10 as string,
		max_total_area as string,
		min_total_area as string,
		{Area (cm^2)} as string,
		{Length (cm)} as string,
		{Width (cm)} as string,
		{Necrotic Tissue (%)} as string,
		{Granulation (%)} as string,
		{Epithelium (%)} as string,
		{Slough (%)} as string,
		{Other Tissue (%)} as string,
		{No Dot Present} as string,
		{No Wound Detected} as string,
		Healed as string,
		{Healing Rate} as string,
		{% epithelialization} as string,
		{% granulation} as string,
		{% slough/eschar} as string,
		{------------------------------------------} as string,
		{Acquired in House?} as string,
		{Additional woundbed details} as string,
		{Cleanse Wound With} as string,
		{Creams / Ointments} as string,
		{Date Wound Acquired} as string,
		{Depth (cm)} as string,
		{Drain Amount} as string,
		{Drain Description} as string,
		{Dressing Change Frequency} as string,
		Dressings as string,
		{Elevate Legs to Level of heart or above for 30 minutes} as string,
		Etiology as string,
		{Gel Dressings Old} as string,
		{Margin Detail} as string,
		Odor as string,
		Other as string,
		Pain as string,
		Periwound as string,
		{Pressure Reduction/Offloading} as string,
		{Room Number} as string,
		{Secondary Dressing} as string,
		{Stalled wound healing cycle despite treatment (PER RAI MANUAL)} as string,
		{Tunneling (cm)} as string,
		{Tunneling Description} as string,
		{Undermining (cm)} as string,
		{Undermining Description} as string,
		{Wound Status} as string,
		facility as string,
		{Days Wound Active} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
source(output(
		{Patient Name} as string,
		{Patient DOB} as string,
		Facility as string,
		Physician as string,
		{Service date} as string,
		{ICD10 codes} as string,
		{Billing codes} as string,
		Encounter as string,
		Billed as string,
		Coded as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source4
source3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		patient_id as string,
		patient_firtsname as string,
		patient_lastname as string,
		mrn as string,
		last_care_setting as string,
		wound_started as string,
		last_visit_date as string,
		clinician_first_name as string,
		clinician_last_name as string,
		max_total_area as string,
		min_total_area as string,
		areacmsq as string,
		lengthcm as string,
		necrotictissueperc as string,
		granulationperc as string,
		epitheliumperc as string,
		sloughperc as string,
		othertissueperc as string,
		no_dot_present as string,
		no_wound_detected as string,
		healingrate as string,
		percepithelizatoin as string,
		percgranulation as string,
		percslough as string,
		acquired_in_house as string,
		additional_woundbed_details as string,
		cleanse_wound_with as string,
		creamsointments as string,
		date_wound_acquired as string,
		depthcm as string,
		drainamount as string,
		draindesc as string,
		dressingchangefrequency as string,
		dressings as string,
		legelevationneeded as string,
		etiology as string,
		getdressingsold as string,
		margindetail as string,
		odor as string,
		other as string,
		pain as string,
		periwound as string,
		pressurereduction as string,
		roomnumber as string,
		secondarydressing as string,
		stalledwound as string,
		tunnelingcm as string,
		tunnelingdesc as string,
		underminingcm as string,
		underminingdesc as string,
		woundstatus as string,
		facility as string,
		dayswoundactive as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false,
	mapColumn(
		patient_id,
		patient_firtsname = first_name1,
		patient_lastname = last_name2,
		mrn,
		last_care_setting = {Last Care Setting},
		wound_started,
		last_visit_date = {Last Visit Date},
		clinician_first_name = first_name9,
		clinician_last_name = last_name10,
		max_total_area,
		min_total_area,
		areacmsq = {Area (cm^2)},
		lengthcm = {Length (cm)},
		necrotictissueperc = {Necrotic Tissue (%)},
		granulationperc = {Granulation (%)},
		epitheliumperc = {Epithelium (%)},
		sloughperc = {Slough (%)},
		othertissueperc = {Other Tissue (%)},
		no_dot_present = {No Dot Present},
		no_wound_detected = {No Wound Detected},
		healingrate = {Healing Rate},
		percepithelizatoin = {% epithelialization},
		percgranulation = {% granulation},
		percslough = {% slough/eschar},
		acquired_in_house = {Acquired in House?},
		additional_woundbed_details = {Additional woundbed details},
		cleanse_wound_with = {Cleanse Wound With},
		creamsointments = {Creams / Ointments},
		date_wound_acquired = {Date Wound Acquired},
		depthcm = {Depth (cm)},
		drainamount = {Drain Amount},
		draindesc = {Drain Description},
		dressingchangefrequency = {Dressing Change Frequency},
		dressings = Dressings,
		legelevationneeded = {Elevate Legs to Level of heart or above for 30 minutes},
		etiology = Etiology,
		getdressingsold = {Gel Dressings Old},
		margindetail = {Margin Detail},
		odor = Odor,
		other = Other,
		pain = Pain,
		periwound = Periwound,
		pressurereduction = {Pressure Reduction/Offloading},
		roomnumber = {Room Number},
		secondarydressing = {Secondary Dressing},
		stalledwound = {Stalled wound healing cycle despite treatment (PER RAI MANUAL)},
		tunnelingcm = {Tunneling (cm)},
		tunnelingdesc = {Tunneling Description},
		underminingcm = {Undermining (cm)},
		underminingdesc = {Undermining Description},
		woundstatus = {Wound Status},
		facility,
		dayswoundactive = {Days Wound Active}
	)) ~> sink2
source4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		patientname as string,
		clinician as string,
		facility as string,
		ICD10 as string,
		billingcodes as integer,
		encounterid as integer,
		billed as string,
		coded as string,
		visitdate as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		patientname = {Patient Name},
		clinician = Physician,
		facility = Facility,
		ICD10 = {ICD10 codes},
		billed = Billed,
		coded = Coded,
		visitdate = {Service date}
	)) ~> sink3
